thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 04 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Chinese trade body says U.S. investigation has no factual basis

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Chinese trade body says U.S. investigation has no factual basis

organizations.name: china chamber of commerce for import and export of machinery and electronic products

text:
SHANGHAI, April 4 (Reuters) - The United States’ trade investigation into Chinese firms has no factual basis and the environment for intellectual property protection has continuously improved, a leading Chinese trade group for machinery and electronic products said on Wednesday.
The China Chamber of Commerce for Import and Export of Machinery and Electronic Products, which has nearly 10,000 members, made the comments in a statement issued to state broadcaster CCTV.
It said that the US’ actions would cause “huge” losses to Chinese and U.S. firms and noted that the Chinese government was ready to take equal measures on U.S. products to safeguard China’s interests. “We will give it full support,” it said. (Reporting by Brenda Goh; Editing by Kim Coghill)
